data.title: When did Salvatore Quasimodo die?
data.meta_description: When Quasimodo sees Frollo smiling cruelly at Esmeralda's execution, he turns on his master and throws him to his death from the balcony in rage. ... He stays at Montfaucon, and eventually dies of starvation, clutching the body of the deceased Esmeralda.
data.text:
When Quasimodo sees Frollo smiling cruelly at Esmeralda's execution, he turns on his master and throws him to his death from the balcony in rage. ... He stays at Montfaucon, and eventually dies of starvation, clutching the body of the deceased Esmeralda.

When did Salvatore Maranzano die?

Salvatore Maranzano died on September 10, 1931 at the age of 45.

How old is quasimodo?

Salvatore Quasimodo was born on August 20, 1901 and died on June 14, 1968. Salvatore Quasimodo would have been 66 years old at the time of death or 113 years old today.

When is Quasimodo Day?

Quasimodo Sunday is a religious holiday that falls on the first Sunday after Easter. It is also known as Low Sunday or the Octave Day of Easter.
